title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper – Deicing Tool for Kitchen

Keep your fridge frost-free with this compact, durable ice scraper designed for quick, safe deicing.

Key features:
- Efficient deicing: Sharp, rigid stainless steel blade lifts and removes ice and frost from refrigerator walls and freezer compartments with ease.
- Comfortable grip: PP (polypropylene) handle provides a secure, non-slip hold for better control.
- Durable build: High-quality materials withstand regular household use.
- Compact size: 17 cm length x 4.5 cm width – easy to maneuver and store in drawers.
- Color options: Blue, gray, or pink.

Materials:
- Blade: Stainless steel
- Handle: PP

What’s in the box:
- 1 Fridge Ice Scraper

Notes:
- Measurement deviation: 1–5 mm may occur.
- Color may vary slightly due to monitor and lighting differences.

Ideal for: Removing frost, ice sheets, and buildup in fridges and freezers to maintain efficiency and maximize storage space.
